clean_description: 1.5x HP for Fire Att.; 3x ATK for each cross of 5 Fire or Water Orbs; 3x ATK & dmg -50% when HP is full, 3x ATK & RCV when HP is 50% or less
description:
1.5x HP for Fire Att.; 3x ATK for each cross of 5 Fire or Water Orbs;
3x ATK & dmg -50% when HP is full, 3x ATK & RCV when HP is 50% or less
